description: When it comes to choc chip cookies, bigger is definitely better. This giant cookie is slow cooked to golden perfection for your eating pleasure.
keywords: Biscuit & cookie,Jun 2022,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Vegetarian,Slow cooker,Sesame free
name: Slow Cooker Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease bowl of a 5.5L slow cooker. Cut 2 x 7cm-wide x 40cm-long strips of baking paper. Using strips, form an ‘X’ over base and up side of bowl.

Place butter and sugars in a medium bowl and mix well to combine. Stir in egg and vanilla until combined. Stir in flour and baking powder until a dough starts to form. Stir in chocolate chips until a dough has formed.

Spread dough evenly over base of bowl. Place a clean tea towel over top of bowl and secure with lid. Cook on high for 3 hours or until cookie edge is golden and puffed, and centre is almost cooked. Slice and serve.
